definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Candied-haws looks sweet and cute, but inside, it is hardy, sour and astringent.
sentences.chinese: 糖葫芦的表面甜美可人，但内核却是坚硬酸涩的。

sentences.english: But the leaf is rather little heart in but many in nice threads continuously acid puckery.
sentences.chinese: 而叶少宁心中却多了丝丝缕缕的酸涩。

sentences.english: Water that is polluted also makes sour sounds.
sentences.chinese: 被污染的水，也会制造酸涩的声音。

sentences.english: And anti-Obama jokes on the internet are pathetic.
sentences.chinese: 网上反对奥巴马的笑话酸涩而糟糕。

sentences.english: "An Umbrella over the Shoulder" records the pains and happiness of love.
sentences.chinese: 《膊头担伞》记载这懵懂爱情的酸涩与甜蜜。

sentences.english: The sounds did not harmonize and sour sounds were created.
sentences.chinese: 这些声音并不和谐，于是就产生了酸涩的声音。

definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
pantothenic acid/vitamin B5/to surge up (of acid in the stomach)
to have a tingling sensation in one's nose (due to grief, pungent odor or taste)/to be choked up
